title: [Self-Directed] Instructional Design Strategies for Enhancing MOOC Sustainability and Completion Rates

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of MOOC basic structures, foundational knowledge in educational technology, and experience in elementary science education
context.additional_context: Strengthening science education course design competencies for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers using the xMOOC model

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the five key factors (individual, family, social, labor, instructional design) influencing MOOC completion rates.
Learners can diagnose structural limitations of xMOOC (Stanford Model) and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can apply insights derived from an energy sustainability-themed MOOC case to elementary science education.
Learners can design learner engagement strategies through project-based assessments and develop implementation plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
